dcterms:creator: Jingwei Ji
Ranjay Krishna
Li Fei-Fei
Juan Carlos Niebles
dcterms:description: A dataset which provides frame-level scene graph labels. It contains 234,253 annotated frames with 476,229 bounding boxes of 35 object classes (without person) and 1,715,568 instances of 25 relationship classes. The relationships include attention, spatial, and contact relationships, with multiple labels for subject-object pairs.
dcterms:title: Action Genome

dcterms:creator: Xindi Shang
Donglin Di
Junbin Xiao
Yu Cao
Xun Yang
Tat-Seng Chua
dcterms:description: A dataset that includes 10,000 user-generated videos selected from YFCC-100M, totaling approximately 84 hours of footage. It contains 80 object categories and 50 predicate categories, providing annotated relation triplets and bounding boxes of objects.
dcterms:title: VidOR
